display_title: Kodiak Mix Hacks Pack | Pancake Mix to Muffins

tables.title: Protein boosting hacks
rows: Use Fairlife milk instead of water. +8g protein per batch.
1/2 cup liquid egg whites. +6g protein, better rise.
1 scoop casein powder. +24g protein, fudgier texture.
